constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 12 (Thursday, January 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YOUNG:
H.R. 444.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2 and
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
[Page H227]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

title: To provide for the conveyance of certain property to the Bristol Bay Area Health Corporation located in Dillingham, Alaska, and for other purposes.
